directions.step:
Combine basil, cheese, garlic, salt, pepper, oil and bread crumbs in food processor. Pulse to combine. Add vinegar and process until smooth
Per serving: 88 Calories; 5g Fat (53% calories from fat); 1g Protein; 9g Carbohydrate; 0mg Cholesterol; 257mg Sodium
NOTES : This unusual pesto is adapted from "The Balsamic Vinegar Cookbook" by Meesha Halm. Mary Carroll is the author of the "No Cholesterol (No Kidding!) Cookbook" and she cut back the amount of oil by substituting bread crumbs as a thickener.
Recipe by: Mary Carroll - St. Louis Post Dispatch
